description:
## Parent Task Context (Already Completed)

> **Note:** The following parent task has already been completed. This context is provided to help you understand the background and requirements for this sub-task. Do not re-implement the parent task - focus only on the new sub-task described below.

### I appreciate the detailed setup, but I notice you haven't provided the actual feature description for me to create a title for. 

Could you please share the **feature description** that you'd like me to generate a title for? 

For example, it might look something like:
- "Fix playlist items that appear squished in the UI"
- "Expand search bar width for better usability"
- "Optimize responsive layout for mobile views"

Once you provide the feature description, I'll generate a concise 5-10 word title for it immediately.

**Description:** Let me help you enhance this task description. First, I need to see the images you mentioned to provide a more accurate specification.

Could you please provide:
1. Image 1 showing the issue with the playlist items being squished
2. Any other relevant screenshots showing the search bar width issue

Once I can see the visual context, I'll create a clear, actionable task description that addresses both UI issues precisely.

---

## Task Description

the suggest aomg search issue is fixed but the playlist still gets squished when clicking the collaborate button and the collaborate screen slides in
title: Fix playlist squishing when collaborate screen slides in
